task.title: Execute Verbs in Commands Tab
task.shortdesc: In the Commands Tab, actions are automatically executed when a selected Set or Class type is combined with a Verb.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Select nodes, either manually or by clicking on a Set or Class type.
Click on a Verb to complete the formula and execute the action.
step.info: Continue clicking on Verbs to execute a sequence of actions.

taskbody.example: In this case, choosing the Set "Graphed" and then clicking the Verb "Label" resulted in the graphed nodes being labelled.
taskbody.postreq: Note that the Verb in the Commands Tab is still blank. This is because, once a Set or Class type has been chosen, the user can continue to execute a series of Verbs.
